headline: Managing your user's local cache
description:
We launched Rubbrband to help you modify and delete cached data in frontend applications.

We found that companies struggle to debug their user’s website problems since they have no visibility into their user’s local cache. As a result, companies ask their users to clear the cache when their website isn’t loading. However, clearing the cache is only a temporary band-aid solution. We developed Rubbrband to let you monitor your user’s frontend cache and fix problems before they occur.

We’d love to hear what you think! If interested, please join the beta at rubbrband.com or email us at contact@rubbrband.com.
